sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Search, Bell, Filter, Calendar, MapPin, Clock } from 'lucide-react'; const Dashboard = ({ user, events, theme }) => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const isDark = theme === 'dark'; const styles = { // 1. DASHBOARD CONTAINER container: { padding: '30px', backgroundColor: isDark ? '#0f172a' : '#f8fafc', minHeight: '100vh', fontFamily: "'Inter', sans-serif" }, // 2. TOP HEADER (The layout you asked for) header: { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: '40px' }, // LEFT SIDE: Profile & Welcome profileSection: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '15px' }, avatar: { width: '50px', height: '50px', borderRadius: '50%', objectFit: 'cover', border: '2px solid #6366f1' }, welcomeText: { display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column' }, hello: { fontSize: '14px', color: '#64748b', fontWeight: '500' }, name: { fontSize: '18px', fontWeight: '800', color: isDark ? '#fff' : '#1e293b' }, // RIGHT SIDE: Search Bar MERGED with Notification searchContainer: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', backgroundColor: isDark ? '#1e293b' : '#ffffff', borderRadius: '50px', // Fully rounded Pill shape padding: '8px 8px 8px 20px', // Padding to fit elements boxShadow: '0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.05)', width: '400px', border: isDark ? '1px solid #334155' : '1px solid #e2e8f0' }, searchIcon: { color: '#94a3b8', marginRight: '10px' }, input: { border: 'none', outline: 'none', background: 'transparent', fontSize: '14px', color: isDark ? '#fff' : '#334155', flex: 1, // Takes available space fontWeight: '500' }, // The Bell is INSIDE the search container notifBtn: { width: '40px', height: '40px', borderRadius: '50%', backgroundColor: isDark ? '#334155' : '#eff6ff', // Light blue circle color: '#6366f1', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', cursor: 'pointer', position: 'relative', marginLeft: '10px', transition: '0.2s' }, badge: { position: 'absolute', top: '8px', right: '10px', width: '8px', height: '8px', backgroundColor: '#ef4444', borderRadius: '50%', border: '2px solid #fff' }, // 3. STATS SECTION (Rest of Dashboard) sectionTitle: { fontSize: '20px', fontWeight: 'bold', marginBottom: '20px', color: isDark ? '#fff' : '#1e293b' }, statsGrid: { display: 'grid', gridTemplateColumns: 'repeat(auto-fit, minmax(240px, 1fr))', gap: '20px', marginBottom: '40px' }, statCard: (bg) => ({ backgroundColor: bg, padding: '24px', borderRadius: '20px', color: '#fff', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', justifyContent: 'space-between', height: '140px', boxShadow: '0 10px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)' }), statNumber: { fontSize: '36px', fontWeight: '800' }, statLabel: { fontSize: '14px', opacity: 0.9 }, // 4. UPCOMING EVENTS LIST eventCard: { backgroundColor: isDark ? '#1e293b' : '#fff', borderRadius: '16px', padding: '20px', marginBottom: '15px', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '20px', boxShadow: '0 2px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.02)', border: isDark ? '1px solid #334155' : '1px solid #f1f5f9', cursor: 'pointer' }, eventDateBox: { backgroundColor: '#eff6ff', borderRadius: '12px', padding: '10px 15px', textAlign: 'center', color: '#3b82f6', fontWeight: 'bold' } }; return (
{/* --- DASHBOARD HEADER --- */}
{/* LEFT: Profile */}
navigate('/profile')}>
Welcome back, {user.name}
{/* RIGHT: Search + Notification (Merged) */}
navigate('/notifications')}>
{/* --- STATS ROW --- */}
12
Events Attended
03
Upcoming Workshops
05
Certificates Earned
{/* --- RECENT EVENTS SECTION --- */}
Upcoming Events
navigate('/events')}>See All
{events.slice(0, 3).map(event => (
navigate(`/event-details/${event.id}`)}>
12
APR

{event.title}

09:00 AM {event.location}
))}
); }; export default Dashboard;
